references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of proteomics, providing a comprehensive overview of mass spectrometry-based techniques used in proteomic analysis.
This paper is highly influential in proteomics by focusing on the critical role of post-translational modifications and their analysis in proteomics.

references.paper_title: An approach to correlate tandem mass spectral data of peptides with amino acid sequences in a protein database
references.reason: This early work established a crucial method for correlating tandem mass spectral data with amino acid sequences, paving the way for advancements in peptide sequencing.

references.paper_title: De novo peptide sequencing by deep learning
references.reason: This highly cited paper introduced a deep learning approach to de novo peptide sequencing, which represents a significant shift from traditional methods.

references.paper_title: De novo mass spectrometry peptide sequencing with a transformer model
references.reason: This more recent paper uses transformer networks, a powerful deep learning architecture, to advance the state-of-the-art in de novo peptide sequencing.
